name: JetMech
description:
CONTROLS

    

Transform between 2 modes: Mech (Slow) and Jet (Fast). Mech can shoot and jet can boost gaining even more speed. You can navigate the menus with move buttons. Use the map to see where you need to go.

STORY

You are a pilot of the new prototype mech that can freely transform into a jet. The Xeon invaders captured the Nok Islands and hold the civilians captive. Your objective is to clear the Nok Islands off enemy forces and restore peace.

-------------------------------------------------------
Game was made for NOKIA 3310 JAM 5.
Game by 6macseem9.
Sound effects by Trix.
